content:
Virtual brokerage event IoT, AI, Robotics & XR @ SIDO 2020 exhibition

Network and find potential partners on Thursday 3 September:
https://sido2020.b2match.io/page-1211

This mixed physical and virtual brokerage/Match-making event on IoT, AI, Robotics and XR might be of interest for members seeking industrial partners.

Date: 3-4 Sep
Location: Lyon (France) and online
